q8388415.brero_massimiliano.PTNetEditor.views.desktop

Class PTNControlPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • q8388415.brero_massimiliano.PTNetEditor.views.desktop.PTNControlPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class PTNControlPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Panel for scaling nodes and arrow heads. It's instantiated with a modified singleton pattern since we need in it multiple classes e.g. to add scale listeners for new nodes and arcs. Beware that PTNControlPanel must be initialized before other classes may use it.
    Author:
    q8388415 - Massimiliano Brero
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getInstance

        public static PTNControlPanel getInstance()
        After being initialized other classes can get an instance of the control panel. This may be the case when we want to add new nodes and arcs as listeners for scaling events.
        Returns:
        PTNControlPanel

      • initialize

        public void initialize(PTNDesktop desktop,
              PTNAppController appController)
        This methods sets desktop an appController as listeners for scaling events. The app controller is responsible to set a flag so that other classes know that the arcs must be redrawn because the node size has changed. The arcs are listeners for themselves since they will be informed when their arrowhead size must be changed.
        Parameters:
        desktop -
        appController -

      • init

        public void init()
        Sets up listeners when first initialized.

      • addPlaceScaleListener

        public void addPlaceScaleListener(PlaceView place)
                           throws PTNInitializationException
        Adds an individual node view as a listener.
        Parameters:
        place - PlaceView Place observing change scale events that will update its size when event for this node type is fired.
        Throws:
        PTNInitializationException

      • addTransitionScaleListener

        public void addTransitionScaleListener(TransitionView transition)
                                throws PTNInitializationException
        Adds an individual node view as a listener.
        Parameters:
        transition - TransitionView Transition observing change scale events that will update its size when event for this node type is fired.
        Throws:
        PTNInitializationException

      • addArcScaleListener

        public void addArcScaleListener(ArcView arcView)
                         throws PTNInitializationException
        Adds an arc view as a listener.
        Parameters:
        arcView - ArcView Arc observing change scale events that will update its size when scaling event fpr arcs is fired.
        Throws:
        PTNInitializationException
